thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1692
thread.title: Denis

author: Denis
title: Denis
text:
needed a next day flight and couldn't find one on Expedia where I usually booked all my flights. Was very happy that I could get the flight at a great rate on Flight Hub without any problems. There was even an offer for one month free special deals membership, which gives you special rates for rental cars and park-n-fly. Glad I found and booked on this site!
Highly recommend
